overview:
Eric H. (EH) is a software pioneer with 23 years experience in software architecture, design, engineering and technical team leadership. His innovative work in networks, clustered server architecture, user experience, collecting user attention, and scaled analytics is at the foundation of new standards and technologies developed by Attensa.

An Apple Design award winner, Eric has led the development of numerous successful desktop and networked applications. As founder and CTO of Attensa, Eric was instrumental in all facets of the next generation of enterprise communication using RSS, AttentionStreams, and deep analytics to improve the timely flow of essential enterprise information. Prior to Attensa, Eric designed digital marketing infrastructure software to help Internet marketing agencies analyze and refine marketing campaigns in near real-time. As the Director of Engineering at Extensis, Hayes led the development of award-winning products including Preflight Pro and Suitcase Server.
